name: Project X
description: Three high-school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.
keywords: birthday party,teen movie,sex,male friendship,friendship between boys

review.author: Gordon-11
review.heading: A real fun watch
review.reviewBody:
This film tells the story of a high school party turning out of control.

There are a lot of films about high school party, but this one is probably is the craziest. The events escalate gradually to the point of being outrageous, which is what makes the film very entertaining. What is more, is that the story is almost believable!
